Message:
In the northern part
of the continent lies
a large altar—the place
meant for sealing demons.

The seal was already on
the verge of breaking.

200 years ago,
it took but one demon
to bring the world to
the brink of ruin.

At this rate,
history will repeat itself.

Then, I heard it—
“the voice of God.”

“...Wouldn’t it be best to
destroy the demons before
they make their return?”

Eradicating the demons
would not only do away
with the need for a seal,
but also bring true peace
to the world.
